@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package io.libraft.kayvee.mappers

Custom JAX-RS ExceptionMapper implementations.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
IllegalArgumentExceptionMapper Specialization of KayVeeLoggingExceptionMapper that transforms an IllegalArgumentException into an HTTP response with a BAD REQUEST (400) status code.
KayVeeExceptionMapper Specialization of KayVeeLoggingExceptionMapper that transforms a KayVeeException into an HTTP response with the corresponding status code.
 

Package io.libraft.kayvee.mappers Description

Custom JAX-RS ExceptionMapper implementations.
